1.text: Garen loses Perseverance for 8 seconds if he takes damage from epic  monsters, enemy  turrets, or enemy  champions, or if he is hit by an enemy ability or affected by an enemy summoner spell, refreshing on subsequent damage or hits to Garen from them.
1.html: Garen loses Perseverance for 8 seconds if he takes damage from epic monsters, enemy turrets, or enemy champions, or if he is hit by an enemy ability or affected by an enemy summoner spell, refreshing on subsequent damage or hits to Garen from them.
markedPassages: monsters
turrets
champions

0.text: CAST TIME: NONE
Active: Garen  cleanses himself of all  slows and gains  35% bonus movement speed for a few seconds.
0.html: Active: Garen cleanses himself of all slows and gains  35% bonus movement speed for a few seconds.
markedPassages: cleanses
slows
35% bonus movement speed

1.text: Additionally, Garen empowers his next basic attack within 4.5 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup,  lunge at the target, deal bonus physical damage, and  silence the target for 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Additionally, Garen empowers his next basic attack within 4.5 seconds to have an uncancellable windup, lunge at the target, deal bonus physical damage, and silence the target for 1.5 seconds.

lunge
silence

2.text: Decisive Strike  resets Garen's basic attack timer.
2.html: Decisive Strike resets Garen's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets

0.text: CAST TIME: NONE
Passive: Garen gains  0.2 bonus armor and  0.2 bonus magic resistance every time he kills an enemy, up to a maximum of 30 bonus resistances at 150 unit kills.
0.html: Passive: Garen gains  0.2 bonus armor and  0.2 bonus magic resistance every time he kills an enemy, up to a maximum of 30 bonus resistances at 150 unit kills.
markedPassages: 0.2 bonus armor
0.2 bonus magic resistance

1.text: After reaching maximum stacks, Garen gains 10% bonus armor and 10% bonus magic resistance.
1.html: After reaching maximum stacks, Garen gains 10% bonus armor and 10% bonus magic resistance.

2.text: Active: Garen  reduces incoming damage by 30% for a few seconds. For the first 0.75 seconds, Garen additionally gains a  shield and 60%  tenacity.
2.html: Active: Garen reduces incoming damage by 30% for a few seconds. For the first 0.75 seconds, Garen additionally gains a shield and 60% tenacity.
markedPassages: reduces
shield
tenacity

0.text: EFFECT RADIUS: 325

Active: Garen rapidly spins his sword around himself 7 (+ 1 per 25% bonus attack speed) times over 3 seconds, becoming  ghosted and unable to basic attack and dealing physical damage to nearby enemies periodically. Judgment can be recast after 1 second for its duration, and does so automatically after it ends.
0.html: Active: Garen rapidly spins his sword around himself 7 (+ 1 per 25% bonus attack speed) times over 3 seconds, becoming ghosted and unable to basic attack and dealing physical damage to nearby enemies periodically. Judgment can be recast after 1 second for its duration, and does so automatically after it ends.
markedPassages: ghosted

1.text: Enemy champions hit 6 times by Judgment are inflicted with  25% armor reduction for 6 seconds, with the duration refreshing upon the 7th hit and every 6th hit thereafter.
1.html: Enemy champions hit 6 times by Judgment are inflicted with  25% armor reduction for 6 seconds, with the duration refreshing upon the 7th hit and every 6th hit thereafter.
markedPassages: 25% armor reduction

2.text: Judgment deals 25% increased damage against the nearest enemy hit.
2.html: Judgment deals 25% increased damage against the nearest enemy hit.

3.text: Recast: Garen ends Judgment prematurely, reducing its  cooldown by its remaining duration.
3.html: Recast: Garen ends Judgment prematurely, reducing its  cooldown by its remaining duration.
markedPassages: cooldown

4.text: Judgment can  critically strike for  (58% +  35%) bonus physical damage. Additionally, Judgment deals 150% damage against non-epic  monsters.

Unique – Endure: After taking damage from a champion or large monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 − 40 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to 66% effectiveness on ranged champions or when triggered by AoE, DoT or proc effects.

Active

Unique – Halting Slash: Deal 175% base AD physical damage to enemies in a 450 radius centered around you and slow them by 40% for 3 seconds. Can move while casting (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – HALTING SLASH: Deal 175% base AD physical damage to enemies in a  450 radius centered around you and  slow them by 40% for 3 seconds. Can move while casting (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).

Passive

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sepsis: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Basic attacking a champion 2 times while they remain affected by Grievous Wounds increases their effect to 40%, and dealing physical damage to a target affected by 40% Grievous Wounds will refresh the empowered effect.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEPSIS: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Basic attacking a champion 2 times while they remain affected by  Grievous Wounds increases their effect to 40%, and dealing physical damage to a target affected by 40%  Grievous Wounds will refresh the empowered effect.

+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Shipwrecker: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum each 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks on-hit to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage. At maximum stacks, the target is also slowed by 50% for 1 second.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SHIPWRECKER: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum each 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while  immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks on-hit to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage. At maximum stacks, the target is also  slowed by 50% for 1 second.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heals you for 120% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

Stats

+350 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CARVE: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+350 health
+70 magic resistance
+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
